attributes.action: Stop selling fireworks to the general public
attributes.additional_details:
I feel the dangers of fireworks is a good first reason to ban them.
The harmful accidents that have been caused by members of the public using them in restricted, built up and public areas out way any reason  to keep selling them.
attributes.background: To change the law to cease sales of fireworks to general public

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/654005
